peculiar.translation[0].definitions[0].d: strange, unfamiliar, or a little surprising
peculiar.translation[0].definitions[0].e: There was a peculiar smell in the kitchen.
It seems very peculiar that no one noticed Kay had gone.
peculiar.translation[0].definitions[1].d: behaving in a strange and slightly crazy way
peculiar.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He’s been a little peculiar lately.
